ComicInfo.Summary:
When Professor Cook interupts a thief attempting to steal his new underwater research vehicle, he asks Meriem to catch the thief on the following night. As Meriem sets out to do so, she comes face to face with a powerful new villain. Underwater terror and brutal fighting await Meriem when the beautiful and deadly adversary takes her into the deep water.
